spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: Include GT Wizard in example design
Include Shared Logic in example design
Include GT COMMON in example design
Include GT COMMON inside GT Wizard
No sharing when inside GT Wizard and PCIe

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx UltraScale+ PCI Express Integrated Block (1-lane, 2-lane, 4-lane, 8-lane and 16-lane) in conjunction with flexible Ultra series architectural features such as integrated GTs (Gigabit Transceivers) and BRAM (Block RAMs) are used to implement a PCI Express Base Specification v3.1 compliant PCI Express Endpoint.

spirit:parameter.spirit:description: The Xilinx Ultrascale Series Gen3 Integrated Block for PCI Expressification v3.0 compliant PCI Express Endpoint.
